channel.title: How to change ::yell Colors

item.title: How to change ::yell Colors
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:11, topic:484510”][quote author=jamie233 link=topic=602746.msg4222832#msg4222832 date=1360861625]

<shad=#>

Could you give me an example of where i would put that in my code?
[/quote]

sendMessage("<shad=#>Hello");

needs to be replaced with different values. Different values represent different colours.[/quote]

Do you think I could do

} else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("heavenlyrune")) { yell("[Head Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); sendMessage("<shad=#>Hello");
Or anyway I could add it too my code at the top?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ::yell Colors
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

  [code] if (playerRights == 1 && playerLevel[16] >= 4) {
            yell("[Mod]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (playerRights == 2) {
            yell("[Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (playerRights == 3) {
            yell("[Owner]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (donator >= 1) {
            yell("[Donator]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (playerRights == 3 && donator == 1) {
            yell("@red@[Owner/Donator]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (playerRights == 1) {
            yell("[Mod]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    } else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("heavenlyrune"))  {
            yell("[Head Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Replace with that.

Make an account with

playerRights 3 and donator 1

It will be red

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ::yell Colors
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

I need help changing the ::yell colors I’m not use to this kind of layout…

if (playerRights == 1 && playerLevel[16] >= 4) { yell("[Mod]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[Owner]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (donator >= 1) { yell("[Donator]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && donator == 1) { yell("[Owner/Donator]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (playerRights == 1) { yell("[Mod]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); } else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("heavenlyrune")) { yell("[Head Admin]-["+playerName+"]: " +command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic
